description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於介紹個體經濟學理論及其相關應用，課程內容涵蓋主題包括：消費者行為與決策、不確定性與資訊不對稱、外部性與公共財、廠商行為與決策、產業型態與市場結構、生產要素市場、賽局理論、一般均衡與經濟效率、以及其他個體經濟的相關議題。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the main methods of systematic economic reasoning. It provides a rigorous treatment of microeconomic theory and its applications. Topics covered in the course will include the theories of consumer behavior; the economics of uncertainty and information; the economics of the public sector; firm behavior and the organization of industry; the economics of labor markets; game theory; and selected topics in general equilibrium and welfare economics.

description.zh: 資訊安全導論為資訊安全之基礎課程，其主要目的是讓初接觸資訊安全領域的學生能夠瞭解什麼是資訊安全，並且能夠對於資訊安全有更正確認知。課程規劃如下：資訊安全介紹,基礎密碼學介紹,電腦病毒與惡意程式,網路安全與攻擊,網路安全防護,應用層安全, 網頁安全,雲端安全,物聯網安全,個人資料保護
description.en: Introduction to Information Security is a fundamental course. The main objective of this course is to enable students in the field of information security to understand what information security is and to have a better understanding of information security. The course describes as follows: Information security introduction, Basic cryptography, Network security and attacks, Network security protection, Application security, Web security, Cloud security, Internet of Things security, Personal data protection

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構,探討的主題包括: ADT(抽像資料型態)及複雜度, 靜態結構與儲存表示, 陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序, 搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

notes: 資財二甲、二乙合開/科研240教室

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。精密量測學概論、長度量測、角度量測、量規設計、幾何誤差量測（含直線度、平行度、垂直度、真圓度、平面度）、光學平鏡、光學投影機、三次元量測、齒輪檢測儀、工具機檢測。
description.en: Metrology Introduction, distance measurements, angular measurements, the design of limit gauges, measurement of geometrical tolerance (straightness, parallelism, squareness, roundness, flatness, etc.), optical plate, profile projector, coordinate measuring machine, gear measurements, machine tool metrology.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。以C語言為主的計算機應用程式設計，得包含：人機界面程式、即時多工程式、輸出入界面程式、多媒體程式、通訊及網路程式。
description.en: Computer programming using C language: programming of human-machine interface, real-time multi-task programming, input/output interface programming, multimedia programming, communicational and network programming.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件簡介、電晶體開關電路、數位積體電路及應用、矽控整流子（SCR）、矽控整流子觸發電路、雙向矽控整流器、運算放大器及應用感測器及應用、電動機驅動電路、變頻器電路。
description.en: Semiconductor Components, Transistor Switch Circuits, Digital ICs and Application, Silicon-Controlled-Rectifier (SCR), Trigger Circuits for SCR, Triac, Operational Amplifier and Application, Sensor and Application, Drivers for Electrical Machines, and Inverters.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。本課程讓學生熟悉機電系統之整合技術與設計(如機電介面之原理、機械系統、感測與致動之原理及其元件、自動控制技術等)。實務製作以分組方式實施，內容包括PC及DSP微處理器控制之倒單擺平衡系統、熱爐箱溫度控制、或自走機器人設計與控制等。
description.en: The course contains technology and design of mechatronic system. For example: interface principle, mechanical system design, sensor and actuator device, and automatic control, etc. Hands-on experiments are carried out by team work and may include PC-based and microprocessor-based control of inverted pendulum system, oven temperature control, or mobile robot design and control.

notes: 機械三合開/限48人/先修課程：自動化控制元件應用

description.zh: 先修課程: 負責教授同意。1.數位影像基礎，2.空間域影像強化，3.頻域影像強化，4.影像還原，5彩色影像處理，6形態學影像處理，7.影像分割，8. 影像壓縮，9.機器視覺系統。
description.en: 1. Fundamental digital image, 2. Image enhancement in the spatial domain, 3. Image enhancement in the frequency domain, 4. Image restoration, 5. Color image processing, 6. Morphological image processing, 7. Image segmentation, 8. Image compression. 9. Machine vision system.

description.zh:
先修課程：3001051或負責教授同意。
本課程係以商用繪圖CAD軟體（如 TCAD 或 ACAD等）為教學範本、內容包括二維製圖、三維製圖、修訂功能表、命令腳本（Script）以及圖組(Block)、圖形功能表等之製作，以輔助機械製圖為主要目標。
description.en: Use commercial CAD softwares (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the tutorial examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and modify the Menu, Script and Block etc..

description.zh:
先修課程：3001051或負責教授同意。
本課程係以商用繪圖CAD軟體（如 TCAD 或 ACAD等）為教學範本、內容包括二維製圖、三維製圖、修訂功能表、命令腳本（Script）以及圖組(Block)、圖形功能表等之製作，以輔助機械製圖為主要目標。
description.en: Use commercial CAD softwares (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the tutorial examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and modify the Menu, Script and Block etc..

name.zh: 電腦輔助工程分析及實習
name.en: Computer Aided Engineering Analysis and Lab.

description.zh: 工程分析概論，有限元素模型建立，進階模組技巧，實體模型的建立，一維元素分析，二維元素分析，三維元素分析，進階範例。
description.en:
Introduction to Engineering Analysis, Finite Element Model Constructing, Advanced Techniques of Module, Solid models  
Constructing, One-dimensional Analysis, Two-dimensional Analysis, Three-dimensional Analysis, Advanced Examples.

notes: 機械三甲乙合開/中英雙語/限40人

name.zh: 電腦輔助工程分析及實習
name.en: Computer Aided Engineering Analysis and Lab.

description.zh: 工程分析概論，有限元素模型建立，進階模組技巧，實體模型的建立，一維元素分析，二維元素分析，三維元素分析，進階範例。
description.en:
Introduction to Engineering Analysis, Finite Element Model Constructing, Advanced Techniques of Module, Solid models  
Constructing, One-dimensional Analysis, Two-dimensional Analysis, Three-dimensional Analysis, Advanced Examples.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹綠色科技及其在二十一世紀對人類生活的影響，內容包括現今幾個最重要的「潔能」與「節能」科技，以及一些「環保」相關科技。「潔能科技」包括風力能、太陽能、水力能、地球內部能源、生質能、路面能、聲音能、燃料電池、電動車等；「節能科技」包括節能住宅、變頻空調等；「環保科技」則包括碳回收主題。介紹內容包括各項技術原理介紹及其發展概況。
description.en: This course aims to introduce green technologies and their influences on human life in the 21st century. The contents consist of the most important topics about the clean energy and energy conservation technologies. The clean energy technology consists of wind energy, solar energy, hydraulic energy, earth interior energy, bioenergy, roadway energy, sound energy, fuel cell, electric vehicles, and so on. The energy conservation technology consists energy save buildings, variable frequency air-condition, etc.. The environmental protesting technology includes carbon recapture etc.. This course will talk the technical principles and their general developing situations.

notes: 機械三合開/限70人/中英雙語

description.zh: 工業4.0智能工廠因為大量使用電腦資訊流進行智慧控制達到產線無人化境地，雲端資料庫技術是智能工廠的核心技術，從智慧排單到網頁控制，達到智能聯網與控制。
description.en: The industry 4.0 intelligent factory uses large amount of information to reach intelligent control without people. Cloud database technology is the core of an intelligent factory, which can reach the intelligent network and control from intelligent production order to website control.

description.zh: 完整且有系統的介紹產品設計實務的工作內容，從規劃設立、執行、管理、協調及最終之提案，針對實務及就業準備，邀請產業主管或負責人講授，並配合工廠及設計工作室參觀，以培養其專業知識及技能，進而了解就業市場概況及應具備之專業知識及技能。
description.en: The overall and systematic introduction of activities in a product design case, from planning, execution, management, coordination and final presentation. For career -prep, this class invites directors from renowned product manufacturers and product design studios to lecture design practice and vocational preparation. The course might also organize field trips to allow participants to experience future design environment.

notes: 機械三、四.訓四機四甲乙.攜四機四合開

description.zh: 本課程為本校「智慧鐵道學程」的進階基礎課程。課程開授之目標，是希望藉由先進智慧鐵道系統的介紹，使修課學生能夠清楚瞭解鐵道產業的未來發展方向，並引領學生積極投入各種先進智慧鐵道應用系統之研究。本課程是以同時段合院授課的方式、針對選讀學程之學生、邀請智慧鐵道系統相關、學有專精的技術研發人員、以業師的身份共同參與授課。本課程會要求修課同學於期末報告時進行實作系統的展示，並邀請鐵道產業專家擔任評審。修習本課程前，不同學系之學生須先修習的課程清單另訂定之。
description.en: This course is one of the advanced core courses for the Intelligent Railway Curriculum. The aim of this course is, via the introduction of advanced intelligent rail system, to have the students realize thoroughly the development trend of futuristic rail industry, and subsequently, to encourage the students into the research and development of various application systems for intelligent railway. This course is a joint lecture among departments inside our college with synchronized class hours. The industrial instructors to our participant students include R&D experts from relevant fields in intelligent rail industry. In their term reports, the students will have to demonstrate the prototypes of their projects and to be reviewed by the invited senior professionals from rail industry. The prerequisites for taking this course will be determined based on the background of students with different majors.

notes: 機械三、四.訓四甲乙.攜四機四合開

name.en: Integration Technology for Networking Manufacturing Systems

description.zh: 製造聯網整合技術配合感測器、控制器、網路系統等，讓人、機器人、原物料、零組件、重要物品或設備，取得人、機、料、法、環的訊息，透過大數據分析與人工智慧，執行各種事前診斷預防、維護、事發處置及事後重建與改善的動作。本課程著重於製造聯網整合技術與實施方法，特別在智能工廠技術包含IoT、感測器設計與選擇、機電整合、數據分析、預防診斷與維修、智慧適應控制等。
description.en: Integration technology for networking manufacturing systems integrates sensor, controller, networking system, etc.. This technology uses big data analysis and artificial intelligence to communicate among human, robot, raw material, parts, important article or equipment, which can do prediction, protection, and improvement, etc.. This course focuses on integration technology for networking manufacturing systems and its practical implementation. The intelligent factory consists of IoT, design and selection of sensors, integration of electromechanics, data analysis, preventive diagnosis and repair, intelligent adaptive control, etc..

notes: 機械四合開和智慧感測學程合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。量測原理及訊號處理的一般方法（含放大電路、動態響應及頻譜分析），說明各種感測器之原理、規格、結構圖、應用的場合及其訊號處理（含速度、位移、加速度、力量、扭矩、功率、壓力、流量、溫度、化學組成、濕度、濃度、照度、電流、電壓、磁通量、磁場強度、各型感測開關等），感測器與電腦之連線。
description.en: Measurement Principles, General Methods for Signal Processing (Amplified Circuits, Dynamic Response, and Frequency spectrum Analysis), Discussion of Principle, Specification, Structure, Occasion and Location of Application of a Variety of Sensors for Measuring Physical Quantities,such as Displacement, Velocity, Acceleration, Force, Torque, Power,Pressure, Flow Rate, Temperature, Chemical Composition, Humidity,Density, Luminosity, Current, Voltage, Magnetic Flux, Magnetic Intensity , a Variety of Sensing Switch, etc.

notes: 機械二合開/限40人/(校)電腦教室

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在促進學生進一步瞭解文化典藏加值應用之概念與方法，並著重於文化典藏單位及其所典藏物件之轉化與詮釋。透過本課程之授課內容，學生可培養以下幾個能力：（1）認識文化典藏加值應用之基本概念；（2）理解文化典藏加值應用之原則與倫理；（3）具備文化典藏應用評估、規劃之專業素養。
description.en: The aim of this course is to facilitate students' understanding of the concepts and methods applied to cultural collections' application, with an emphasis on the transformation and interpretation of cultural collections they contain. In this course, students will develop the following skills: (1) understanding the basic concepts of value-added application of cultural collections; (2) understanding the principles and ethics of value-added application of cultural collections; and (3) professional competence in the evaluation and planning of the application of cultural collections.

description.zh: 機率空間；組合分析；隨機變數；期望值與慣矩；聯合分佈隨機變數；慣矩母函數及特徵函數；大數法則及中央極限定理；隨機漫步及帕森程序。
description.en: Course Title:Probability and Statistics Description:This course is designed for students to get concepts and methods of Probability and Statistics. The main purpose of this course is establishment of the foundations of industrial management, quality control, and industrial economics.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以哈佛式企業個案研討及撰寫為主。課程中，包含傳統式與哈佛式兩種教學方法之比較，各產業個案之研討，及個案撰寫之方法。各產業個案之研討中包含議題有企業營運模式之變革，服務創新，科技化服務，與企業電子化等。個案撰寫包含教學手冊及個案之學理背景及應用。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to teach the Harvard’s case teaching and case writing. In the course, it includes the comparison of traditional case teaching with the Harvard’s case teaching, the industry case study, and the theory of case writing. In industry case study, several topics will be cover above like business model reengineering, service innovation, and IT innovation. In case writing, the theory of the teaching note and case analysis will cover.

description.zh: 本課程以R語言介紹資料科學和數據可視化。本課程注重於資料科學的實際應用，學生將學習到如何整理、探索、轉換和數據可視化。 學生以作業練習和獨立項目來獲得實數據科學的基本技能。
description.en: This course introduces data science and data visualization through the R language. Focusing on applied data science skills, students will be introduced to the methods to tidy, explore, transform, and visualize data. Students will practice them with real data in exercises and projects.

notes: 經管三、四和經管所合開

description.zh: 本課程目的在介紹東西方傳統工藝的本質及現代的演進歷程，並配合工藝設計名作介紹，認識當代工藝發展思潮。從講解文化設計美學與工藝鑑賞的理論基礎，幫助學生瞭解文化設計未來發展趨勢，培養對於傳統工藝的鑑賞品味。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to introduce the modern evolution of the traditional crafts in the East and the West, and to introduce the trend of contemporary craft design development. This course explains the theoretical basis of cultural design aesthetics and process appreciation to help students understand the future development trend of cultural design and cultivate the appreciation and taste of traditional crafts.

description.zh:
本課程目標是協助學生透過校園環境整理及打掃體驗活動，認識勞作教育之理念，從勞作課程中養成同學不怕苦、不怕難與不怕髒的企業家精神，使學生透過實際的勞作課程，培養學生手腦並用，勤勞愛物的觀念，培養學生健全的人格、良好品德、正確的價值觀及刻苦耐勞的工作態度。
課程內容：包含四大階段
（一）勞作教育理念介紹：選取勞作教育相關主題，由授課教師於課堂上講述。可包含勞作教育意義、勞作教育前測作業說明
（二）勞作教育實作階段：勞作課程分三項不同情境施作。
（三）課堂討論與反思：學生必須於各實作階段課程進行討論與反思，並撰寫心得報告、完成後測作業。
（四）期末成果分享：勞作教育期末成果分享，並辦理獎勵工作。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to introduce the idea of labor service to students. Students who take this course have to participate in the campus cleaning activities. This is to help students building up: (i) the team-work abilities; (ii) the concepts of ethics; (iii) the abilities of concerning the society. In addition, the course would help students to develop the accurate attitudes in the daily life and the healthy personalities. Furthermore, this course would also help students to enrich the sense of humanities. Four stages are included in this course: (i) the introduction of the labor service, (ii) the field work studies, (iii) the class discussions, and (iv) sharing of the experiences of the labor service.

description.zh: 本課程將分理論、作品研讀與實地操作三部份。首先介紹口述歷史與田野調查理論。之後透過研讀相關作品瞭解該主題之歷史。在理論與實例示範的基礎之下，修課學生擬定田野調查地或口述主題，並定期報告進行情況，期末需有成果報告的分享與討論。
description.en: This course is divided into theory, work study and field operation. Under the basis of theory and model demonstration, students will choose one topic and report it regularly. At the end of this semester, a final report is needed.

description.zh: 當代飾品設計及製作是一門以實作為主，實務講述為輔的設計性課程。透過實務教學進行，提供學生基礎金工珠寶的製作能力並進行應用。課程旨在結合金屬工藝與多元媒材的當代趨勢，引導學生系統性的完成作品後，將透過展演形式發表成果。
description.en: This course will use a combination of lectures, demonstrations, and practical experiences to educate the student in the basic skills required to work as a member of jewelry design discipline. This class will also be an introduction to the multiple media of design. Contemporary Jewelry Design will provide an overview of the professional world of Jewelry design through a practical exhibition.

description.zh: 期使學生瞭解地震工程學涵蓋之領域，並簡介地球物理學、地質學、地震學、振動學、材力、土壤力學、結構動力學、施工技術以及彈性波動學各領域之基本知識，讓學生領悟如何將各學門知識領域應用於地震工程之設計與施工。
description.en: Use of soil mechanics principles in the analysis,design,and construction of structures.Principles of compaction and compaction control;an introduction to slope stability analysis and landslides;earth reinforcement systems,and ground impovement techniques.

description.zh: 本課程講授內容兼顧理論與實務。促使學習土木工程學生瞭解施工安全及衛生的重要性，如何規劃推動各項安全管理實務工作。確認施工觀念，發揮全面防災功能，確保施工安全與衛生。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the protection of fire engineering， It will cover: Safety and disaster preclusion of opencast ground、foundation construction、hypothesis engineering、structure engineering、fitment engineering etc.

description.zh: 工程地質對於工程結構物之規劃、設計、施工、維護等均有重要關係。本課程內容包括：(1)地質調查、(2)岩石之風化及其性質、(3)地下探查、(4)地球物理探測、(5)邊坡滑動與山坡、(6)建築物、結構物之基礎、(7)公路與鐵路、(8)隧道、(9)壩址地質調查。
description.en: Fundamentals of mineralogy,petrology,sedimentation,stratigraphy,and structural geology needed by environmental scientists to understant earth materials.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

name.zh: 全球議題與趨勢討論(二)
name.en: Discussions on Global Issues and Trends II

description.zh: 本課程欲讓應用英文系學生了解改變社會結構之全球議題與趨勢。特此希望學生在參與討論的過程中，能夠產出對世界有正面效益之改善之道。課堂限制之關係，課程內容將著重於閱讀、答辯，和研討篩選後之報告及新聞，藉以達到上述之目的。
description.en: This course aims to engage English major students in understanding current issues and events taking place in the world that are redefining our global reality and restructuring the world order. A greater goal of such studies of global issues and activities is to urge students to participate in the dialogues and actions to change and to make better of the world.  The course content centers on reading, discussing and debating on selected reports and news to uphold all that matters for the aforementioned pursuits.

notes: 大二多元英文(僅限英文系學生修讀)

description.zh: 你熱愛文學嗎?你對社會及社會影響世界的方式好不好奇?你想不想探索社會政治事件表面背後的意涵?你喜不喜愛語言? 你是否會對許多故事的力量和神奇之處著迷?如果你的答案是否定的，透過這門課程，你會發現文學提供了既有價值又發人深省的社會觀點。反之，如果你熱愛文學，並且早已深受文學語言的吸引，你在這門課程裡將可從文學間接獲取豐富的生活經驗，進而學會如何理解世界。具體而言，藉由探索文學和社會的互動關係，透過研究社會如何促成文學的產生、賦之予脈絡，並加以型塑，以及文學如何反映、影響、塑造、及改變社會，你將會瞭解文學及語言的力量，更重要的是能在所處之世界裡變得安然自在。我們可能研讀的作品包括，但不限於，Things Fall Apart, Anthills of the Savannah, Uncle Tom’s Cabin, 1984, Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close等書。
description.en: Do you have a passion for literature? Are you curious about society and the way it influences the world around us? Would you like to explore the facade of sociopolitical events? Do you love language and are you fascinated by the power and magic of stories? If not, you will nevertheless learn in this course that literature provides a valuable and inspiring perspective on society. On the other hand, if you have already had a strong passion for literature and if you are already fascinated by literary language, you will learn in this course how to make sense of your world by enriching your vicarious experiences of it through literature. Specifically, by exploring the interaction between literature and society, by studying not only how society gives rise to, contextualizes, and molds literature, but also how literature mirrors, influences, shapes, and changes society, you will realize the power of literature and language and, more importantly, become at home in the world. The texts we will

notes: 大二多元英文(僅限英文系學生修讀)

description.zh: 係利用物理機械整理及化學處理方式，改善紡織品之吸引性、服務性和最終用途之機能性。整理加工技術包括結構穩定性(諸如壓縮、煮呢、蒸呢、熱定型)；表面特性改質(諸如平滑性、粗糙性、光澤性及其他美觀性質)與功能性改質(諸如防縐、防縮、防火、防污、防水、防微生物與昆蟲、耐光、耐冷熱、耐污染質及化學藥劑、耐氣候、耐摩擦、抗起球、抗靜電)。
description.en: The attractiveness, serriceability and end-use performance of textiles are imporved by the application of physical mechanical and chemical processes.  Finishing techniques include dismensional stabilization(such as, sanforization, crabbing, decatizing, heat-setting),modification of surface characteristics(such as, smoothness, roughness, luster, other esthetic fabric qualities) and functional property modification (such as, resistance to wrinkle shrinkage, fire, soils and stains, water, microorganisms and insect, light, heat and cold, air pollutants and chemical agents, weathering, abrasion, pilling and static change).

description.zh: 結晶學已經是成為當今科學研究領域的一門重要知識與技術。至目前為止至少有20位諾貝爾獎得主其貢獻都與結晶學有關。在這課程，我們將闡述結晶學的相關基本知識，例如: 晶格、對稱、原子散射、結構因子及解結構。此外，這門課程也將涵蓋實際操作解結構。所有基礎知識與實作，涵蓋單晶繞射與粉末繞射。也將涵蓋部分蛋白質結晶學的基本知識。
description.en: Crystallography has become an important field in scientific knowledge and technique in physics, chemistry, materials, and biology, which has been recognized by more than 20 winners of Nobel prize. In this course, we will illustrate the fundamental knowledge about crystal lattice, symmetry, atomic scattering, structure factor, and structure determination. In addition, the course also includes practices in structure determination by single crystal x-ray diffraction and powder x-ray diffraction. All fundamental knowledge and practices are mainly in small molecular cases, but part of knowledge of protein crystallography will also be included.

description.zh: 固態化學是一門涵蓋物理、化學、與材料的跨領域科學。在此課程，我們將講述如何應用化學的知識與概念來了解固態材料，這包含晶體結構，化學鍵結、繞射、光譜、與熱分析技術。此外，我們也將用物理化學的觀念，來討論固態材料的光、電與磁的特性。
description.en: Solid state chemistry is a multidisciplinary filed which covers the physics, chemistry and material science. In this course, we will illustrate how to use chemistry knowledge to approach the solid state materials, which includes the crystal structure, chemical bonding, diffraction techniques, spectroscopy, and thermal analysis. Moreover, the electrical, magnetic and optical properties of solid state materials will also be discussed by the point of view of physical chemistry.

description.zh: (1) 草繪。 (2) 基本特徵、3D實體零件設計。 (3) 工程特徵、3D實體零件設計 (4) 3D零件組裝 (5) 工程製圖
description.en: (1) Sketching. (2) Basic features, 3D part design. (3) Engineering features, 3D part design. (4) 3D part assembly. (5) Engineering drawing

name.en: Design and Practice of  Control System

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。使學生瞭解如何由自動控制理論與概念,轉化成控制系統的實務設計與實踐。課程內容包括: 機構、致動器、感測器、與控制器等元件及其整合技術介紹, 配合LabView + myRIO及周邊設備進行控制系統實務設計與測試,使同學由實驗中體會與培養控制系統的實務設計能力。
description.en: The object of the course is to let students understand how to transform the theory and concept of automatic control into a design and practice for a control system. Course contents include: introduction to mechanism, sensors actuator and controller elements, as well as the needed integration technique. LabView + myRIO and peripheral devices are used in the course to design a practically useful controller and to verify its effectiveness. Students therefore can gain the practical controller design experience via this learning by doing approach。

description.zh: 1.光纖感測介紹，2.光纖感測元件，3.光纖感測系統，4.光纖感測多工技術，5.光纖雷射感測系統，6.長距離光纖感測系統，7.大範圍多點光纖感測系統，8.光纖感測網路。
description.en: 1. Introduction to fiber optic sensor, 2. Fiber sensor devices, 3. Fiber sensor systems, 4. Fiber sensor multiplexing techniques, 5. Fiber-laser-based sensor systems, 6. Long-distance fiber sensor systems, 7. Large-scale multipoint fiber sensor systems, 8. Fiber sensor networks.

name.en: The theory and practice of 3D Printing

description.zh: 3D列印（英語：3D printing），又稱加法製造、積層製造（Additive Manufacturing，AM），可指任何列印三維物體的過程。3D列印主要是一個不斷添加的過程，在電腦控制下層疊原材料。3D列印的內容可以來源於三維模型或其他電子資料，其列印出的三維物體可以擁有任何形狀和幾何特徵。本課程將介紹其原理及配合實機操作，使學生能對3D列印技術有正確的認識。(本課程鼓勵學生參加經濟部iPas的3D列印工程師考試)
description.en: 3D printing, also known as additive manufacturing (AM), refers to processes used to create a three-dimensional object in which successive layers of material are formed under computer control to create an object. Objects can be of almost any shape or geometry and are produced using digital model data from a 3D model or another electronic data. This course will introduce the principle knowledge of 3D printing and giving the opportunity to practice the use of 3D Printing.

notes: 機械四合開/實作課 限30人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機器人簡介、齊次轉換矩陣、運動方程式及反運動方程式、軌跡規劃、機器人動力學、機器人控制系統、機器人程式語言、機器人於工業界之應用技術。
description.en: Introduction to Robotic Manipulators, Homogeneous Transformations, Kinematic Equations and Solutions, Trajectory Planning, Dynamics and Control of Robots, Programming and Applications.

description.zh: 歷史想像讓人可以掙脫現實世界，縱橫遨遊於歷史之海。本課程學習相關歷史，培養學生利用本地文化為素材，學習文化相關創作、鑑賞的基礎知識。現代人對影像敏銳度很高，藉由「影視史學」的圖像與影像的引領，使修課同學瞭解各地不同的歷史發展、生活樣貌與思考模式。以活潑的史實，引領同學多面向的思考，理解多元價值的真諦。
description.en:
Historical imagination can release us from the bonds and limits of reality by 
giving us various perspectives of ideas, values and patterns of life over times. Now through the media of film, a powerful recorder of life and events, this course intends to equip students with an ability to appreciate a film as a cultural and historical text so as to seek the presence of historical phenomena and sociological significance. Vivid cases of film evidence will be presented to inspire students to interpret and reevaluate the great historical issues of the times so that they can understand the true essence of many values and foster the capacity of multi-dimensional thinking.

name.en: The Theory and Practice of the Mind

description.zh: 「心靈的理論與實踐」(The Theory and Practice of the Mind)旨在對人的心理各個層面，從不同的角度進行探討。課程將以理論講授與實際操作交替進行:我們將借重當代學術研究成果，如腦神經科學、心理學、哲學、神經生物學、社會學等等，以增進我們對人自身重要議題的認識。這些議題至少包括:心靈(Mind)、心流(Mental Flow)、情緒(Emotion)、選擇(Choice)、決定(Decision)、感官(Sensations)、直覺(Intuition)、自我分析( Self-Analysis)、單純性(Simplicity)、潛意識(Subconscious)、創新(Novelty)、洞察力(Insight)與意志力 (Willpower)等等。若時間允許，我們將在課上播放相關的科學影片與電影。
description.en: The course investigates several key aspects of human mind from different angles.  To achieve the goal, we shall discuss current topics and issues on the following subjects: Neuroscience, Psychology, Philosophy, Neurobiology, Sociology, etc.  The lecturing shall proceed from reading texts to practicing subjects and methods.  And the topics and issues will include at least: Mind, Mental flow, Emotion, Choice, Decision, Sensations, Intuition, Self-Analysis, Simplicity, Subconscious, Novelty, Insight, and Willpower, etc.  We may watch some relevant scientific films and movies in the class if time allows.

description.zh: 物質文化是人們生活內容的反映留存，也是族群精神信息的窗口。對於文物的品賞鑒定，在針對料、工、型、紋等面向作周全的觀察賞玩中，斷代與辨偽的素養至關緊要。古玉以其珍稀價昂，仿製現象由來久遠，其用力之深，在諸文物項類中，向以精微著稱，因此，據以為文物鑑賞之入門，深刻而切用。本課程即以中國玉器賞鑒要領及收藏心法為授課主軸，會同業師強化陶瓷老件、宗教古畫以及中國三大硬木傢俱的品鑑，並旁涉香學、茶藝道具、衣飾刺繡等雜項組合，令學子在今後品賞現代工藝、創設經紀文創商品間，對於「老味」的韻致，初步養成較高辨識與感受能力，在「新」與「善」的功用考量中，涵詠著「真」與「美」的另類素養。
description.en:
Material culture is a reflection of the content of people's lives, and it is also a window for the spiritual information of ethnic groups.For Cultural relics appraisal, in the comprehensive observation and appreciation of materials, crafts, patterns etc.False literacy is crucial. Ancient jade is rare and expensive. Its imitation phenomenon has a long history.Among the various cultural relic items, Xiang is famous for its subtlety. Therefore, it is believed that the entry to the appreciation of cultural relics is profound and useful.
This course is based on Chinese jade appreciation and collection methods as the main axis of teaching.Including old ceramics and miscellaneous items such as China's three major hardwoods, clothing and embroidery, make students appreciate modern art,The training room for the creation of brokerage cultural and creative products has initially developed a high level of recognition and feeling for the charm of "old flavor". Among the "good" uses, it has the "au

description.zh:
主要課程內容包含電腦基本常識，程式設計簡介，
資料型態，流程控制，函式，副程式，陣列與字串，
檔案，應用程式設計。
description.en: An introduction to basic computer concept, programming, data types, flow of control, functions, subroutine, arrays, strings, files, and applications

description.zh:
課程主軸以實務應用為出發點，擬建立水情與洪氾模擬的整合系統。其系統架構包含下列主要項目：
1.連結雷達降雨QPESUMS與數值氣候模式的資料，用以作為整個系統的主要輸入資料來源；
2.建立模擬計算能量，包含降雨逕流、渠道、下水道、水利設施、邊界條件如下游潮位、以及二維漫地流淹水模式；
3.動態展示所有資料與計算成果，包含一維與二維的時序列資料；
4.各種轉換處理，包含圖層套疊、空間內插、時間序列補遺等。
學員需要設立水情模擬整體環境以及熟悉各項子架構之間的連結，再者，用此系統來對應評估颱洪事件的應變計畫與治理設計，也是相當課程相當著重的部分。

notes: 四甲乙&防災所合開/大學部上限10人

description.zh:
近年發生之福島核災、印度新德里爆炸案等各種天然及人為災害已顯著影響到人類的生活品質與安全。本課程目標有三：(1)了解各種災害形成原因及環境背景因素；(2)評估災害對社會、環境及人類之影響及因應措施；(3)新穎技術可擴大環境監測尺度並預警災害。較為代表性之災害會於課堂中案例講述，加深同學學習印象。工程背景較為薄弱之學生，亦適合選修此課程。
學習成效：學生可獲得：
(1)	災害管理內涵與重要觀念。
(2)	評估災害風險與危機管理。
(3)	研擬災前的災後復原重建計畫。
description.en:
The recurrent occurrences of various natural and manmade disasters like the December 2004 Tsunami, the bomb blasts in the cinema halls of Delhi and many such incidences have diverted our focus towards safety of one’s own life. The goals of this course are three-fold: (1) To educate students about the underlying natural process that give rise to hazards. (2) To emphasize how society evaluates and confronts the dangers posed by these natural processes from a political, social, and ethical perspective. (3) Expose students to the technological innovations that are allowing an increasing large human population to monitor, predict, and warn society about natural hazards and impending disasters. Case studies of recent and past natural disasters will be discussed. This course is designed for students without an extensive background in science or math and can be used to partly satisfy minor programs in Environmental Geosciences.

notes: 三四甲乙&防災所合開/大學部上限25人/全英授課

name.zh: 土木與環工之衛星遙測應用與實作
name.en: Applications of Satellite Remote Sensing in Civil and Environmental Engineering with labs

description.zh: 隨著衛星資料的取得變得更為容易，衛星遙測在各領域的應用在近年來變得更為廣泛。本課程將從遙測之基本概念開始介紹，接著介紹常用的衛星資料來源，最後本課程將簡介在土木與環工領域的衛星遙測應用。本課程一半以上的時間將為實作，學生將熟習在遙測分析軟體上分析真正的衛星資料，並在學期末遞交對自選主題之一研究報告。
description.en: The applications of satellite remote sensing data in various fields have been popular with the increase of selections of satellite data sources in recent years. This course will start with basic concepts of remote sensing, then introduce popular satellite data sources. In the end, the course will introduce applications of satellite data in the field of civil and environmental engineering. More than 50% of the class time will be hands-on. Students will have the opportunity to work on actual satellite data. At the end of the semester, students will need to submit a research report on topics chosen by students.

notes: 四甲乙&防災所合開/大學部上限25人/中英雙語授課

description.zh: 本課主旨在培養學生職場英語文溝通能力，如提案、企劃案提寫、時事討論、公司產品行銷、書信寫作，希冀能夠藉由本課程之修習，加強學生進入職場前的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with a firm foundation in business communication skills. Students will learn how to present a proposal, start a discussion, and promote company products in English. It is hoped that by the end of this course, students are equipped with sufficient knowledge of general and business English.

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課程以聽力訓練為基礎，藉由對不同情境對話培養英文聽力，亦盼讓學生增加字彙量。透過持續的練習和多樣性的活動—像是小組討論，影片和角色扮演，讓學生進一步了解如何掌握聽力技巧。
description.en: This course aims to help students develop their listening skills in different situations. This is a listening-based course, and through listening to different dialogues, students will be expected to improve vocabulary as well. With consistent practice and multiple activities—small-group/pair discussion, video-watching and role-playing, students will have a better understanding of how to use listening skills.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh:
1.科技創新與策略
2.研究與創新手法
3.研發流程設計
4.研發流程管理
5.新產品開發
6.設計審查
7.設計研究
8.研發策略
9.品質機能展開
10.品質企劃
11.成本企劃
12.技術企劃
13.資料庫建立
description.en:
1.Technology, innovation and strategy
2.Research and innovation method
3.Research and development process design
4.Research and development process control
5.New product development
6.Design review
7.Design research
8.Research and development strategy
9.Quality functional development, QFD
10.Quality design
11.Cost design
12.Technology design
13.Research and development database

description.zh: 本課程主在讓學生瞭解服務業的重要性和特性.如何作好服務並使顧客滿意。 內容:服務業概論、服務傳送系統、服務業地點選擇、服務品質、生產力和品質改善、預測、服務業的經營策略、個案討論、論文討論。
description.en: Service management is to discuss How to manage service and satisfy customers. The content of the course: Service concept 、The service delivery system 、Service facility and layout、Productivity and quality improvement、Forecasting、Service quality、Service strategy、Customer satisfaction、Case study、Paper discuss.

name.en: Introduction to Thin Film Science and Engineering

description.zh: 薄膜材料科學，真空科學與技術，薄膜蒸鍍製程，放電、電漿、離子與表面作用，物理氣相沈積，化學氣相沈積，基材表面與薄膜成核，薄膜結構，薄膜性質測試，薄膜之相互擴散、反應與轉換，薄膜之機械性質。
description.en:
1. Thin film materials science
2. Vacuum science and technology 
3. Thin film evaporation processes
4. Discharge, plasma, and ion-surface interaction
5. Plasma and ion beam processing of thin films
6. Chemical vapor deposition
7. Substrate surfaces and thin film nucleation
8. Film structure
9. Characterization of thin films and surface
10. Interdiffusion, reactions, and transformations in thin films
11. Mechanical properties of thin films

description.zh: 先修課程：3002010或負責教授同意。晶體結構、鋼之變態、相平衡原理、退火與正常化、淬火與回火、表面硬化處理、構造用鋼、工具鋼、其它鋼料及鑄鐵之熱處理。
description.en:
The contents of this course can be categorized as followings: 
1. fundamental metallographic concepts.
2. The effects of alloying elements in steel.
3. Hardenability 
4. General heat treatment processes: annealing, hardening, tempering, and normalizing. 
5. Special heat treatment process : tool steels hardening and tempering. Quenching and tempering of constructional steels, case hardening, nitriding, carbonitriding, induction hardening, and flame hardening.

description.zh: 本課程主要概括性介紹分為三部分：第一、奈米基本理論－介觀物理奈米微粒、奈米碳管與奈米線、奈米薄膜的結構特性、奈米塊體材料的性能等；第二、奈米加工與檢測；第三、奈米材料之應用。
description.en: This course is divided into three parts. Part 1: the fundamental of nanostructure materials. The topics include: nanoparticles, carbon nanotube, nanowire, nanostructure coating, bulk materials, etc. Part 2: fabrication of nanomaterials. The topics include: self-assembled, scanning probe microscope. The measurement of nanomaterials include scanning probe microscope, scanning tunneling microscope, Raman spectroscopy, etc. Part 3: the state-of-the art review the application of nanomateria.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料性質、製程與結構之關係、機械基礎-彈性行為、塑性基本理論。冶金基礎-單晶的塑性變形、差排理論、強化機構、材料的破壞。
description.en:
Mechanical Fundamentals: Introduction, stress and strain relationships for Elastic Behavior, 
Elements of the theory of Plasticity, etc.. Metallurgical Fundamentals: Plastic Deformation of Single Crystal, Dislocation Theory, Strengthening Mechanism, Fracture, etc..

description.zh: 介紹審計準則與查核報告、職業道德、專業責任的保持：查核人員的監管和法律責任、審計證據、審計業務承接、內部控制、資訊科技環境下的審計、審計抽樣的應、查核工作底稿、收入循環、採購支出及付款循環等。 本課程參考最新國際準則公報並依照現行教學及考試方向調整原有架構之外，更針對鑑識審計、公司治理、審計業務承接、查帳和客戶之間的關係、風險評估以及資訊科技環境下的審計等做了更多的著墨，而近更動之審計公報也於本版一併進行更新，以求更符合趨勢。
description.en: Introduction auditing standards and audit report, maintaining professional ethics, professional responsibility: the regulatory and legal responsibility to check personnel, audit evidence, audit business undertaking, internal control, information technology audit environment, audit sampling should be to check the working papers, income circulation, procurement spending and payment cycle and so on. The course reference to the latest international standards and adjust the original architecture communique teaching and examination in accordance with current direction, it is more for the forensic audit, corporate governance, auditing business undertaking, under the audit and the relationship between the customer, risk assessment and information technology environment audit done more inked, and audit bulletin of recent changes in this edition also be updated in order to be more consistent with the trend.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一、二年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman and Sophomore students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in. Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹使用於智慧家庭、智慧製造與智慧醫療應用的感測器結構與基本工作原理，包含光學感測原理、半導體感測原理、機械感測原理、化學感測原理、生物感測原理、各種感測器之測量系統及轉換界面電路設計與近期的感測技術基礎科學發展與議題。
description.en: This course introduces the sensor structure and basic working principles used in smart home, smart manufacturing and smart medical applications, including optical sensors, semiconductor sensors, mechanical sensors, electrochemical sensors, biosensors. Moreover, we will discuss various sensor measurement systems, conversion interface circuit design, and recent scientific development."

notes: 電機、電子、資工、光電二、三和智慧感測學程合開

When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh:
一、系統、相、成份、自由度、Gibbs相律及其應用
二、一成份系統相圖熱力學。
三、二成份系統相圖熱力學。
四、三成份系統相圖熱力學。
五、相變化動力學簡介。
六、相圖測定簡介。
description.en:
1.System、 phase 、component 、freedom 、Gibbs Law and its application
2.One component system
3.Two component system
4.Three component system。
5.The kinetics of phase equilibrium (transformation)
6.Phase diagram determination

description.zh: 材料科學為工程教育的重要科技，材料的性質與特性，為現代工程設計中佔有相當重要的地位，金屬材料的各種性質，都基於其內部構造的變化，其內部原子聚集成規則的結晶構造，亦或聚集成非結晶構造，其所形成的各種物理特性，由最基本的結晶構造開始了解。電子顯微鏡，破壞力學，超導性，電傳導，超塑性，動態回復，動態時效應變。差排理論、結晶核的形成與成長，合金相理論，晶界自由度，鑄造物的成核與均質化，硬化現象，固體擴散現象，破壞現象及理論，潛變的形成與原因等，充分了解金屬材料特性上的理論基礎與變化軌跡。
description.en: Properties and characteristics of materials play important role in modern engineering design.Each property of materials is based on its transformation at inner structure, its atoms inside converge either a regulated crystal structure or a noncrystal structure, their physical property should be understood from the most fundamental crystalline structure, such as electronic microscope, destructive dynamics, super-conductivity, electronic conductivity, super-plasticity, dynamic recovery, dynamic aging strain , dislocation theory, the formation and growth of nucleus, alloy phase theory, degree of freedom of crystal boundary , nucleation and homogenization of casting product, hardening phenomenon, solid diffusion phenomenon, destructive phenomenon and theory, creep formation and its reason, all of these make student fully understand the theory basis and change record of the metallic material characteristics.

description.zh: 介紹各種奈米結構材料：奈米碳管、奈米線、量子點、量子線和奈米複合材料的基本特性以及製備與應用技術，期能對奈米材料的物性、製造與應用有整體的認識。
description.en: This course will deal with the chemical and physical properties of nanomaterials. It will cover the preparation, structure, properties and applications of quantum dots and lines, carbon nanotubes, and nanocomposites.

description.zh: 將熱力學定律應用於計算凝結相之化學位能與其平衡，逸壓和活性因素，溶液熱力學，多元金屬溶液，相圖和相變化，運用電腦模擬相反應和相圖，及研擬冶金數學模式。
description.en:
It applies the theory of thermaldynamics to calculate chemical potential energy and
its equilibrium of condensed phase, released pressure and activated factors, solution
thermaldynamics, complex metal solution , phase diagram and phase change,
computer-aided phase reaction and phase diagram simulation, and planning a
mathmatics model of metallurgy.

description.zh: 工程地質學為地質科學之應用學門之一，本課程之內容在介紹工程地質的一般關念及基本原理，包括工程地質學導論、工程工址調查重點、工程地質中之材料因素、岩體中之弱面、地質作用的動力與岩石之褶皺、工程地質之計量化及其應用、工程地質在自然邊坡穩定之應用、各種自然岩石與土壤之簡介、工程地質在水庫工程之應用、工程地質在壩工之應用、工程地質在隧道工程之應用、工址調查之目的方法與程序、工程地質圖簡介、地質鑽探與現地試驗、工程地質中之環境因素等部份。
description.en: This course of Engineering Geology is designed as an upper-division course for undergraduate geology majors and graduate students, with an emphasis on construction or environmental concerns. Also enrolled are civil engineers with a background in geology and those who are interested in geologic applications to construction. The course builds on a basic knowledge of geology by relating geology to engineering fundamentals and construction concepts. The topics of this course include 1.Origin and development of the earth, 2.Introduction to the Engineering Geology, 3.Elements of Rock and Soil Mechanics, 4.Engineering properties of rocks, 5.The environmental factors of the Engineering Geology, 6.The weak planes in the rock body, 7.The environmental factors of the Engineering Geology, 6.Geologic hazards, 7.The rock mass classification and rating, 8.Landslides, subsidence, and slope stability, 9.Site investigation, 10.Case study in the Engineering Geology

notes: 材資三、四乙合開，由新聘老師授課

description.zh: 利用化學方法進行地質探勘
description.en: ntroduction to geochemical exploration

notes: 材資三、四乙合開 限30人

description.zh: 本實習著重在材料的合成法，包含人工晶體及各式無機材料的合成實作。實驗設計皆搭配「材料合成」授課內容，所得之樣品將進一步做表面與結構上的分析。核心實驗計有： (1)固態反應法合成鈦酸鋇粉末 (2)化學氣相沈積法沈積薄膜材料 (3)沉澱法合成磁性氧化鐵粉末 (4)溶膠─凝膠法合成二氧化矽粉末 (5) 溶膠─凝膠法合成二氧化矽薄膜 (6)氧化還原法合成金奈米顆粒 (7) 磷酸二氫銨晶體成長 (8) 物理氣相沈積法沈積金薄膜材料
description.en: The laboratory sections in this course are designed to synthesize various inorganic materials. Eight experiments will be carried out in a semester including: 1. Synthesis of BaTiO3 powders by solid-state reaction 2. Preparation of thin film by chemical vapor deposition 3. Synthesis of magnetic Fe3O4 powders by precipitation reaction 4. Synthesis of SiO2 powders by sol-gel reaction 5. Synthesis of SiO2 thin film by sol-gel reaction 6. Synthesis of Au nanoparticles by oxidation-reduction reaction 7. Crystal growth of NH4H2PO4 8. Preparation of gold thin film by physical vapor deposition.

description.zh:

description.en:
Basic knowledge: HIRAGANA and KATAKANA writing and reading ability.
English Description:
* Basic Japanese grammar explanation and self-introduction of personal professional field by Japanese.
* How to explain the scientific and technical by Japanese.
* Search and study of Japanese technical materials, comparative explanation of technical KATAKANA language and English technical language.

* Professional Japanese technical article writing practice.

description.zh:

本課程係以商用繪圖CAD軟體（如 TCAD 或 ACAD等）為教學範本、內容包括二維製圖、三維製圖、修訂功能表、命令腳本（Script）以及圖組(Block)、圖形功能表等之製作，以輔助機械製圖為主要目標。

Budget and cost control management5.	Planning of construction engineer project6.	Purchase and Estimate 7.	Material and Equipment control management8.	Contract and specification management9.	Safety and sanitation management10.	Quality control management

description.zh: 瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1.常微分方程式之特殊解法，2.傅立葉(Fourier)級數及轉換，3.矩陣代數，4.偏微分方程式，5.數值方法，6.複變函數。

name.zh: 當代城市中都市社會基礎設施再思
name.en: Rethinking urban social infrastructure in contemporary cities

description.zh:
由於九零年代後，城市急速擴張與超越領域性(de-terrorization)的連結等新興狀態萌生，基礎設施(infrastructure)的定義逐漸開始難以精確認定，而身為城市興衰論述的經常主體，基礎設施自身的論述與再定義卻在空間學門中成為那缺落的一塊。

基於此，本課程期望透過幾項特定學門角度，提供一個對於基礎設施為研究主題的論述框架，進而連結建築學門與相關空間學門間對於當代全球城市論述中之縫隙，能在跨學門田野研究中提出他種可能性(alternatives)。 本課程將以兩種方項進行基礎設施當代性的"實踐"; 部分課程內容將邀請德國杜賓根大學台灣研究中心，以空間社會學角度提供授課交流。另一部分將透過雙邊學生，以共同主題進行台北與德國城市的實際田野調查並以比較分析的方式進行合作討論。課程架構則以建築學與空間社會學為主軸剖析，分為五個部分:全球城市與多尺度論述，當代基礎設施與建築/地景對話，社會基礎設施的物質性與再生產，看不見的基礎設施與田野調查為總結。預計學生能透過不同學門角度的切入、於不同文化背景學生間合作討論、多種教學方式的引導，培養基礎辯證思考之能力並進一步對當代都市基礎設施的空間性研究之興趣。
description.en:
In the contemporary word, especially in globalized cities, infrastructure is hard to define for many reasons and at some points infrastructure is also often invisible to its users.

This class will therefore seek to rethink the subject of infrastructure from particular perspectives which frame the structure of this module. We then proposed a join-class with Taiwan study centre at University of T?bingen, Germany for wider debates and teaching possibilities as well. There will be two academic discourses-Architecture and sociology involved and formed into five sessions which can be seen in course syllabus. In so doing, it will focus on firstly by reading theory; secondly, by examining specific case studies that illustrates how these theories manifests themselves; and thirdly, by considering how these infrastructures may be changing the understanding of contemporary globalized cities and reproducing urban networks in different fields and countries.

description.zh: 本課程主要教授在建築上之節約能源設計之理念、技術、法規及案例分析等，授課內容包含：1. 建築節約能源導論2. 建築能源對策3. 建築外殼節能設計4. 建築空調節能設計5. 建築採光與照明節能設計6. ENVLOAD之應用7. 綠建築之發展8. 節能案例解說與分析9. 相關法令解說
description.en: This course is focus on the concept technique law and case study about Energy Conservation Design of Architecture .It major content includes :1. Introduction about Architecture's Energy Conservation.2. Impact of Architecture's Energy Conservation.3. Envelope Design of Architecture's Energy Conservation.4. Air Conditional Design of Architecture's Energy Conservation.5. Lighting and Illumination of Architecture's Energy Conservation.6. Application of Envelope Design.7. Development of Green Architecture.8. Illustration and Analysis of Case study.9. Relative Law and Regulations.

description.zh: 本課程目的在建立大學生以自身專業，在社區社會責任實踐中的身體力行；藉由對原住民部落社區議題盤點，研擬對策，並在與部落族人溝通後，擬定包括：社會計畫、設施設計、營造計畫、執行措施等階段工作內容，之後親自著手進行計畫實踐。以利於培養學生博雅的品格、並體會專業社會服務的情操與體驗，開拓生命視野。
description.en:
The purpose of this course is, to provide students to practice the social responsibility based on their expertise and to develop sentiments through these social services for aboriginal tribes. 
By means of inventory on issues in tribes, the social plan, facility plan, construction plan and executive plan would be drafted, and communicated with people, then be fulfilled by students themselves.

notes: 建築三、四和職建都所合開

name.zh: 跨域全齡商品設計開發
name.en: Interdisciplinary Product Design for All Ages

description.zh: 藉由跨領域合作與產業接軌模式，配合體驗活動與設計思考課程，引導學生發掘與分析不同年齡族群的生活困難，進行全齡產品開發設計與評估驗證。
description.en: This course is through interdisciplinary cooperation and industry model with experiential activities and design thinking courses. Lead students to discover and analyze different needs of all ages, and product design and assessment tests.

notes: 工設三四與日碩合開；人數上限13人

description.zh:
先修課程：負責教授同意。
本課程主要介紹幾何光學與Coherent光學兩部份之基本概念與應用﹐提供機械領域的學生有關光的知識﹐讓機械領域的學生有能力加入機光電技術整合。本課程首先介紹幾何光學﹐幾何光學雖然簡單﹐卻是光學應用最普遍的知識﹐接著進入Coherent光學原理與應用介紹﹐Coherent光學在光量測技術部份佔了非常重要的地位﹐透過本課程的訓練﹐學生將可更順利的進入光學實驗室工作﹐當然﹐本課程也適合其他對光學有興趣的學生來修習。
description.en: The lectures in this course include two main parts, the geometrical and the coherent optics. Due to the future high technology, the optomechatronics, needs the cooperation of knowledge among the optics, the electrics, and the mechanics. This course gives the students of mechanical engineering the chance to participate in this work group. The lecture will first show the students the geometrical optics which is simple but important in the field of optical application. The coherent optics is the main part in this course which occupies the most optical technique of measurement. After the course the students should have the enough knowledge to work in the optical laboratory. Certainly, this course is also useful for all students who are interest in the area of the optics.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件簡介、電晶體開關電路、數位積體電路及應用、矽控整流子（SCR）、矽控整流子觸發電路、雙向矽控整流器、運算放大器及應用感測器及應用、電動機驅動電路、變頻器電路。
description.en: Semiconductor Components, Transistor Switch Circuits, Digital ICs and Application, Silicon-Controlled-Rectifier (SCR), Trigger Circuits for SCR, Triac, Operational Amplifier and Application, Sensor and Application, Drivers for Electrical Machines, and Inverters.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
description.en: This course is intended to provide a review of essential grammar skills as a background for students to construct sentences that convey ideas effectively and clearly.  The main content includes the correction of sentence fragments, run-on sentences, misplaced modifiers, dangling modifiers, and faulty parallelism.  Further focus is placed on varying syntactical structure, and on avoiding errors related to commonly confused words, slang, pretentious wording, cliches, and wordiness.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
description.en: This course is intended to provide a review of essential grammar skills as a background for students to construct sentences that convey ideas effectively and clearly.  The main content includes the correction of sentence fragments, run-on sentences, misplaced modifiers, dangling modifiers, and faulty parallelism.  Further focus is placed on varying syntactical structure, and on avoiding errors related to commonly confused words, slang, pretentious wording, cliches, and wordiness.

description.zh: 本課程強調全方位的國際商用英語溝通。現今各領域上之商業活動多以英語進行，因此本課程注重發展學生以英語文進行流暢之溝通的關鍵能力，特別強調商業組織內外部常見的正式溝通之形式，包括商用英語寫作、簡報與會議技巧。課時也納入非正式溝通技巧，指導學生學習應對職場情境，因應相關之溝通需求。
description.en: This current course emphasizes a holistic view of business communication in a global context.  Given that business communication across from fields of business activities is now made possible by the English language, the course thus aims to develop the ability to use critical skills essential to successful communication in English, with particular emphases on forms of formal communications that are highly visible within and outside business organizations, including writing of business correspondence and reports, presentations and meetings. Informal communication skills are also incorporated to address workplace situations to identify the relevant communication needs.

name.zh: 新聞英語及聽力訓練（二）

description.zh: 本課程目的在啟發學生英語聽力，分析及思辨能力。本課程自報紙，雜誌及電視選取豐富的新聞及媒體教材, 以訓練聽力及筆記的技巧。 此外，在課堂上將討論一些有爭議性的或者有趣的議題，以培養學生獨立思辨能力。
description.en: The course aims to develop the student's techniques of listening, analyzing and critical thinking in English. A variety of journalistic and media texts will be selected from newspapers, magazines and T.V. to reinforce listening training and note-taking skills. Besides, some controversial or interesting issues will be discussed in class to encourage the student's independent and critical thinking.

description.zh: 本課程幫助學生習得敘述、描寫、推論、議論、省思、說明等文體方面的寫作技巧，並指導學生從閱讀、圖片、日常生活事件，及課堂討論內容中取材，以加強邏輯思考和流暢寫作能力。
description.en: This course aims to develop and reinforce students' strengths to create unified and coherent pieces of composition in a variety of styles--narrative, descriptive,  argumentative, reflective, and expository.  Students will be guided to write in response to readings, pictures, events in their daily lives, and discussions from the class.  Thought-provoking topics dealing with current issues are used to stimulate and foster critical writing strategies. This course enables students to write and discuss logically and clearly; they also need to incorporate grammatically newly-built vocabulary into their writing.

description.zh: 本課程幫助學生習得敘述、描寫、推論、議論、省思、說明等文體方面的寫作技巧，並指導學生從閱讀、圖片、日常生活事件，及課堂討論內容中取材，以加強邏輯思考和流暢寫作能力。
description.en: This course aims to develop and reinforce students' strengths to create unified and coherent pieces of composition in a variety of styles--narrative, descriptive,  argumentative, reflective, and expository.  Students will be guided to write in response to readings, pictures, events in their daily lives, and discussions from the class.  Thought-provoking topics dealing with current issues are used to stimulate and foster critical writing strategies. This course enables students to write and discuss logically and clearly; they also need to incorporate grammatically newly-built vocabulary into their writing.

description.zh: 本課程欲提升英文系學生之溝通能力，並著重於簡報部份。中高階英語能力之學生須發表口頭報告，藉此增進有效之語言使用策略。
description.en: This course aims to enhance English-major students’ communicative competence with special emphasis on business presentations and meetings. By developing effective skills, strategies and tactful language use, students with high-intermediate proficiency level of English will be able to prepare as well as present verbal reports to achieve career goal.

description.zh: 本課程欲提升英文系學生之溝通能力，並著重於簡報部份。中高階英語能力之學生須發表口頭報告，藉此增進有效之語言使用策略。
description.en: This course aims to enhance English-major students’ communicative competence with special emphasis on business presentations and meetings. By developing effective skills, strategies and tactful language use, students with high-intermediate proficiency level of English will be able to prepare as well as present verbal reports to achieve career goal.

description.zh: 本課程著重於商業溝通及實務的應用。每個實例討論均能幫助學生了解英文商務應用，並且提供學生去研習，分析並將個人論點英文表達。課程的重點有二：加強學生理解英文在商業領域的重要性，增強學生在商業案件中的綜合分析的表達能力。此外，由實際的商業實務中反應出各種未來可能出現的不同挑戰，讓學生有機會學習應對。根據課程規定，學生須具備高級英文的能力跟基本的商業知識。
description.en: The course explores the intersection of the English language communication and cases in real business world.  Each case to be discussed in this course illustrates the many aspects of business operations and provides students with the opportunities to examine, to analyze and to present their views in English. The emphasis of the course is two-fold. While reinforcing the importance of business communications in English and enhancing students' analytical competence in discussing the cases, real-world business stories reflect a multitude of challenges to resolve and opportunities to embrace in hopes that students are well-prepare to cope with all these in the future to come.  As the course prescribes, students are required to have an advanced English level and fundamental business knowledge.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
description.en: This course, using a functionally-oriented approach, aims at increasing university-level EFL writing students' English writing skills and developing them into more fluent, confident writers. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to compose a wide variety of extended writing pieces, including letters, memos, abstracts, reviews, creative writings, and technical reports.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
description.en: This course, using a functionally-oriented approach, aims at increasing university-level EFL writing students' English writing skills and developing them into more fluent, confident writers. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to compose a wide variety of extended writing pieces, including letters, memos, abstracts, reviews, creative writings, and technical reports.

description.zh: 此筆譯入門課程旨在使學生熟悉中英翻譯的基本概念、技巧與原則。課程中亦將介紹中英對比分析與翻譯之關聯，並協助學生將語言對比知識應用於翻譯實務中。學生將能於本課程中習得各類型翻譯所需之策略。
description.en: This is an introductory course aiming to familiarize students with basic concepts, skills and principles of Chinese-English translation. Moreover, the relevance of Chinese-English contrastive analysis to translation practices will be introduced, and students will learn how to apply the linguistic knowledge to practical work. By the end of the course, student will develop useful and appropriate translation strategies to deal with a range of translation tasks.

description.zh: 此筆譯入門課程旨在使學生熟悉中英翻譯的基本概念、技巧與原則。課程中亦將介紹中英對比分析與翻譯之關聯，並協助學生將語言對比知識應用於翻譯實務中。學生將能於本課程中習得各類型翻譯所需之策略。
description.en: This is an introductory course aiming to familiarize students with basic concepts, skills and principles of Chinese-English translation. Moreover, the relevance of Chinese-English contrastive analysis to translation practices will be introduced, and students will learn how to apply the linguistic knowledge to practical work. By the end of the course, student will develop useful and appropriate translation strategies to deal with a range of translation tasks.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有進階韓語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to enhance their Korean abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Korean language.

description.zh: 為什麼要閱讀或研究莎士比亞? Catherine Belsey 回答道：是為了莎翁的獨特性。如她所言：「莎士比亞不僅是英語世界上流社會文化的精華，亦為其整體文化的精髓。」因為莎劇的辭彙，迄今仍通用於英語世界，並已融入日常生活之結構中。這現象不僅發生在現在的英國，自莎翁的時代開始，莎翁的語彙在全世界就從未停止流通過。何況，莎翁震撼人心的詩歌和劇場藝術，無人出其右的人性掌握，以及非凡的人生哲學思維與洞見，向來受到世人的珍愛。如世人常謂：莎士比亞的語言可觸發我們的想像力，為我們在人生的各個層面(包括職業層面)提升溝通效率。為了這些重要的理由，本課程將引導學生欣賞莎士比亞的若干劇作。
description.en: Why Shakespeare? Catherine Belsey answers that it is because of his singularity. As she observes, "Shakespeare is part and parcel of English-speaking culture, and not only high culture." For "phrases from the plays are still current, woven into the fabric of everyday life" in Britain now and have, in fact, been circulated in the world since the early modern era. Besides, Shakespeare has been cherished for his powerful poetry and stagecraft, his nonpareil grasp of human nature, and his remarkable philosophical insights into life. As people often observe, Shakespeare may trigger our imagination with his language and promote effective communication in every aspect of our life, including that of our careers. For these important reasons, this course aims to guide students to appreciate Shakespeare by focusing on a number of his plays.

description.zh: 以對流行事物，如電影，音樂，廣告，服裝，電視，通俗小說等，在當代文化思潮中的影響，及其所扮演角色探討為經，並對於英語在各範疇中展現之語彙，修辭，語法，技巧之賞析為緯，引領學生進入一個交織著現代語文與現代意涵的世界。
description.en: This course aims at giving an approach to the study of television, popular music, popular literature such as magazines and best sellers, fashion and movies, as well as an examination into the influence of all aspects of our daily lives on our basic beliefs and values. It involves the use of methodologies from both the humanities and the social sciences in the effort to interpret expressive cultural forms. Students are encouraged to participate in discussion over selected topics from contemporary issues.

description.zh: 引導學生瞭解如何根據不同對象、不同場合、不同時間、不同情境，貼切地使用英語，也概括介紹分析語言溝通所需的概念與工具。
description.en: This course is concerned with how speakers organize what they want to say in accordance with who they are talking to, where, when, and under what circumstances. It offers a broad overview of the concepts and tools that are required for analyzing how linguistic communication works.

description.zh: 本課程延續「中英口譯入門」之內容，引導學生學習中英雙向之商務口譯技巧並認識商務口譯之場域特性與本質。學生持續演練逐步口譯筆記，強化習得之技巧。課程重點在熟練如何在高度時間壓力下，即刻聚焦演說片段的主旨，並透過筆記重啟被動記憶。學生也將進一步認識商務同步口譯技巧,透過本課程，認識商務口譯的認知面向與非語言變數。
description.en: This course builds on Introduction to Chinese-English Interpreting and equips students with skills in business interpreting in both directions. Students continue with practical exercises aimed at reinforcing note-taking skills. The nature and characteristics of business interpreting are introduced. More emphasis is placed upon learning to zero in on the main idea under heavy time pressure and re-activate passive memories with the aid of note-taking. Students also learn essential SI strategies. The course seeks to acquaint students with the cognitive dimensions and extra-linguistic variables with regard to business interpreting.

description.zh: 本課程延續「中英口譯入門」之內容，學生演練雙向語言之積極聆聽、重述、記憶保留、摘要及逐步口譯筆記，強化之前習得之技巧。擴大譯出語演說之議題深度與廣度，口譯片段加長，學生能持續加強分析與歸納綜合訊息的能力。學生進一步認識基礎專業同步口譯，回溯之前習得的口譯技巧，熟悉同步口譯的基本要素，包括重述、專注力分割、一心多用、聽譯時間差、預測及重組等。
description.en: Based on Introduction to Chinese-English Interpreting, students continue with practical exercises aimed at reinforcing skills in active listening, recall and memory retention, gist extraction and note-taking in both directions. Increasing lengths and difficulties of speeches of diverse topics also enables students to strengthen and apply more advanced analytical and synthetic skills. Students continue to brush up on skills obtained previously and learn essential SI strategies, including paraphrasing or re-oralizing, split attention, multitasking, the time lag between interpreter and speaker, anticipation and reformulation.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。以C語言為主的計算機應用程式設計，得包含：人機界面程式、即時多工程式、輸出入界面程式、多媒體程式、通訊及網路程式。
description.en: Computer programming using C language: programming of human-machine interface, real-time multi-task programming, input/output interface programming, multimedia programming, communicational and network programming.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。燃料及燃燒、基本熱傳理論、蒸汽動力廠、壓縮機、燃氣輪機、內燃機、汽油引擎、柴油引擎、冷凍空調循環。
description.en: Fuels and Combustion, Principles of Heat Transfer, Steam Power Plants Compressors, Gas Turbines, Internal Combustion Engines: Gasoline Engines, Diesel Engines, Refrigeration And Air Conditioning.

description.zh:
本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：
(I) 高分子加工學之基礎: (a)輸送現象, (b)高分子黏彈學, (c)高分子混煉。 
(II) 高分子加工學之應用: (a)壓模法, (b)沖模法, (c)反應沖模法, (d)絲線成形等專題。
description.en:
The course focuses on the "trouble shooting" in the polymer processing. Both theoretical and practical topics will be included. The main contents are divided into the following units: 
(I) Fundamental studies: (a) Transport phenomena (b) Viscoelastic properties of polymer melt, (c) Polymer compounding and blending. 
(II) Practical studies: (a) Compression molding, (b) Injection molding,, (c) Reaction injection molding, (d) Fiber formation, and (e) Membrane formation.

description.zh:
無機化學係化學三大骨架之一，日常生活中之各樣物質大部分是由無機材料製成，課程係以深入淺出方式教授，授課內容涵蓋主族元素與過渡元素。課程內容包括:原理、主族元素化學、硼族、第1, 2, 15, 16, 17 族元素、過渡元素化學、
過渡元素、第一過渡系列元素、鈦,鉻,鈷,鎳,銅
description.en: Inorganic chemistry is one of the three frames of chemistry. Various materials in our daily life are composed of inorganic materials. This course will be given in a manner of easy-getting-point. The contents comprise of chemistry of main group elements and transition elements.  The course covers the following topics: (1) Survey of principles (2) Chemistry of main group elements (A. Boron; B. Group 1, 2, 15, 16, 17 Elements) (3) Chemistry of transition elements (A. Survey of Transition Elements; B. Elements of the first transition series; C. Titanium, Chromium, Cobalt, Nickel and Copper.

description.zh: 本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

notes: 限機電所及製科所研究生加選，機電所英文門檻補救課程

name.en: English in Conferences and Escort Services

description.zh: 本課程進一步加深商業會議所需之英語能力，諸如會議重點摘要、溝通及主持司儀；另詳細介紹其常見隨行外賓的英語使用情境、商展介紹、外賓接待、工廠參觀及活動導覽等，並提供相關訓練。
description.en: This course prepares students for conferences with focused English skills such as summarizing speeches, engaging in effective communication, acting as a MC or moderator. Introduction to and training for other workplace scenarios involving escorting international guests, such as working at trade shows, acting as an attach?, providing factory tours or other guided tours.

description.zh: 介紹產品開發的流程與工作的內容，運用產學合作模式，輔導學生實際參與和體驗產業界之產品開發專案，訓練學生團隊合作與問題解決能力。
description.en: Introduce Product develop process and C-flow , guide and help students ' active ,training their team work capability , independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

notes: 工設四與日碩合開；人數上限15人

description.zh:
先修課程：3001051或負責教授同意。
本課程係以商用繪圖CAD軟體（如 TCAD 或 ACAD等）為教學範本、內容包括二維製圖、三維製圖、修訂功能表、命令腳本（Script）以及圖組(Block)、圖形功能表等之製作，以輔助機械製圖為主要目標。
description.en: Use commercial CAD softwares (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the tutorial examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and modify the Menu, Script and Block etc..

description.zh: 人類在遠古時代，就有採集或遊耕的遷徙行動。旅行依其目的可分成宗教、商業、軍事、教育、研究與觀光休憩等種類。但是具近代意義的旅行與近代社會制度、交通建設、生活文化息息相關。其中教育、調查研究與觀光等尤其是近代旅行文化與過去最大之差異，本課程介紹近代旅行的開始、近代旅行性質與景點的變遷，並展望未來旅遊文化的發展。
description.en:
Far from ancient times, humans traveled for various purposes like religion, commerce, military, education, studies, and expedition. In recent years, the motives and meanings of travel have changed; people leave their home under the influence and needs of social systems, transportation industry, living cultures, and particularly education, research, and tourism. This course aims at  
giving an overview of the travel culture in modern times, dealing with issues such as changing attraction spots, positive and negative impacts on our societies, and how the scale and importance of travel will evolve in the future.

name.zh: 鐵道車輛系統與維修基地
name.en: Railway Vehicle System and Maintenance Depot

description.zh: 「鐵道車輛系統與維修基地」課程，乃為培養具有鐵路車輛分析設計及檢修技術操作能力之人員，掌握鐵道裝備設計製造、檢修的基礎知識與應用能力，具有鐵道車輛製造、檢修、運用、管理等綜合職業能力和創新精神的高素質技能型專門人才。本課程將從鐵道車輛基本結構開始介紹，並探討鐵道車輛與鐵道基礎之互制關係。而後導入各式特殊鐵道車輛設計之原理與用途，如：高速客車、傾斜式列車、自導向系統….等，並研討各種車型之行駛穩定性與脫軌風險計算方式。最後介紹鐵道車輛維修之概念與實務，並介紹維修基地之設計與配置，再導入先進預兆健康預防檢修法與AR技術於檢修之應用與發展。
description.en: This course of "Railway Vehicle System and Maintenance Depot" will cover the basic design criteria of the railway vehicle, its sub-systems and integration. We will discuss factors that affect the design, sizing, manufacturing and maintenance of the sub-systems of the railway vehicle, including their integration with other sub-systems to work as one complete train. Various factors affecting reliability, accessibility and maintainability will be addressed. Then several types of vehicle (high-speed-vehicle, tilting train, self-guide bogie will be introduced to determine the dynamic stability and derailment risk. Finally, the design of maintenance depot will be studied and the latest technologies (PHM, AR) on railway vehicle maintenance will be introduced.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導、對流原理、強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式、輻射熱傳遞、凝結與沸騰、熱交換器、熱傳遞中的特殊論題。
description.en: Steady-State Conduction-One Dimension, Steady-State Conduction-Multiple Dimensions, Unsteady-State Conduction, Principles of Convection, Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer, Natural- Convection Systems, Radiation Heat Transfer, Condensation and Boiling Heat Transfer, Heat Exchangers, Special Topics in Heat Transfer.

description.zh:
本課程將教授學生FPGA程式開發、硬體系統設計、和如何利用FPGA加速深度學習演算法。課程大綱如下:
1. Xilinx & Vivado開發環境
2. High-level Synthesis (HLS) & SystemC 程式開發
3. Finite Impulse Response (FIR) Filters
4. Discrete Fourier Transform & Fast Fourier Transform
5. Matrix Multiplication
6. Prefix Sum and Histogram
7. Video Systems
8. Deep Learning Implementation on FPGA
9. Pruning & Quantization
10. Object Detection on FPGA
description.en:
This course teaches FPGA programming, hardware system design, and how to implement and accelerate Deep Learning Algorithms on FPGA. The syllabus is shown below:
1. Xilinx & Vivado IDE
2. High-level Synthesis (HLS) & SystemC
3. Finite Impulse Response (FIR) Filters
4. Discrete Fourier Transform & Fast Fourier Transform
5. Matrix Multiplication
6. Prefix Sum and Histogram
7. Video Systems
8. Deep Learning Implementation on FPGA
9. Pruning & Quantization
10. Object Detection on FPGA

name.zh: 建築設計競賽設計實務

description.zh: 透過鏈結教育部設計戰國策之計畫，本課程以國內外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: By linking with Ministry of Education’s IDC program, this course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students ' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 本課程引導學生瞭解建築材料之性能以及相關規格。延伸建築構造課的內容讓學生瞭解建築構造工法與材料的關聯性。藉由系列課程培養學生在建築設計上或建築實務應用面上的基礎知能。
description.en: This course guides students to understand the properties of building materials and specifications. Extending the content of the building construction allows students to understand the relationship between building construction methods and materials. Through a series of courses, students are trained in basic knowledge in architectural design and practical application.

description.zh: 音樂概論以透過此課程讓學生對音樂有總體認識，了解音樂的元素、技術理論及文化背景，同時在探索音樂美感構成上的標準，我們可以從探索不同歷史時期的人文思想背景，了解對於當時音樂創作理念與風格發展的影響，以及音樂審美觀念的發展演變之影響，立基於探索音樂的發展方向、藝術本質及審美意涵，對音樂藝術概念及美學思想之延伸探討。
description.en: Through this course—Introduction to Music, students would have a general understanding of music, understand the elements of music, technical theory and cultural background, at the same time in the music aesthetic to explore the composition of the standard, through exploring the different historical periods of humanistic background, to understand for the time that the idea of music composing and the impact of musical style development, as well as the development of music aesthetic concept of the evolution of the impact, based on discussing the development of music, the essence of art, and aesthetic meaning, to develop the concept of musical art, as well as a probe into the extension of aesthetic thought.

description.zh:
法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。
有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

description.zh: 生命科學概論，重心放在人體生命科學，並強化醫學的角色。此外，中西醫結合的觀點，詮釋抗老、防癌。以身心靈養生的方式，強化預防醫學。並從人類疾病的本源性病因，根本探討。當然，如何增強免疫力，袪除自由基是主軸。在探究人體潛能、身心靈養生或疾病的本源性原因時，都必須重視「經絡」系統。總之生命是非常奧妙的，不僅只物質面，更要重視心靈層面，中西醫整合方向，必是廿一世紀的主流。
description.en: This course focuses on human life science and emphasizes the roles of medicine on improving the life quality of human beings. It also uses the point of view of integration traditional Chinese and western medicine to interpret how to prevent the aging of body and occurrence of cancers. This course also focuses on how to keep the body, mind and spirit in the best conditon in order to prevent the occurrence of human diseases. In addition, it deeply discusses the eseential etiology of human disease and teaches audiences how to enhance the body immunity and how to get rid of free radicals. The importance of meridian system of the human body and its relationships to human potentiality, body, mind spirit and diseses are also discussed. Life is marvelous. The completeness of life depends on the saisfaction of not only the material but also menetal and spiritual needs. Integration of the traditional Chinese and western medicine to improve the life quality of human beings is the main issue.

description.zh:
法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。
有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。

Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

description.zh: 新經濟與舊經濟的分野不是在有『e』還是沒有『e』，而是在有『i』還是沒有『i』，而『i』就是『Innovation，創新』。二十一世紀的『腦力經濟』最重要的戲規則就是『智慧財產權』，同時也是WTO會員國必須遵守的重要規範之一。課程內容主要包括三個最基本的智慧財產權課題：專利權，商標權，以及著作權；而為配合本校學生學科背景，本課程將較著重於『專利』方面的實務知識，並且講授『如何激發創意，以培養學生日後能好好應用『智慧財產權』的保護。
description.en: The difference between New-economy and Old-economy is not caused by having "e" or not having "e", but caused by owining "i" or not owning "i". where "I" means "Innovation:.  Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members.  This course includes the basic three subjects of Intellectual Property:Patent, Trademark, and Copyright.  In order to accommodate the learning background for most of NTUT students, the contents of this course will focus more on the practical practice of the Patennt.  In addition, it also includes the subject of "how to activate your creativeness:so as to make students can use what they learn, "Intellectual Property:, to protect their intellectual work.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹中華民國憲法、探討憲政體制的運作、人民權利義務的規範及相關法律的適用等問題。期能使學生認知國家民主法治的實施狀況，維護社會秩序與個人基本權利，進而體現人性尊嚴的價值。
description.en: This course focuses the discussions on the Constitution of the Republic of China,constitutional mechanism, the rights and obligations for the people and legitimate operations of the society. It is our hope that the students may have a better understanding on how the democracy is performed in our country as well as on how to preserve social security and basic human rights of the individuals-with the realization of human dignity as our extreme goal.

description.zh: 生命科學概論，重心放在人體生命科學，並強化醫學的角色。此外，中西醫結合的觀點，詮釋抗老、防癌。以身心靈養生的方式，強化預防醫學。並從人類疾病的本源性病因，根本探討。當然，如何增強免疫力，袪除自由基是主軸。在探究人體潛能、身心靈養生或疾病的本源性原因時，都必須重視「經絡」系統。總之生命是非常奧妙的，不僅只物質面，更要重視心靈層面，中西醫整合方向，必是廿一世紀的主流。
